Westlake Boys’ High School teacher killed during Coastal Classic yacht race https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/longtime-teacher-at-top-auckland-school-westlake-boys-high-school-killed-during-coastal-classic-yacht-race/4WZBJYNRJVGF7PUW5TJQW7SVJM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/longtime-teacher-at-top-auckland-school-westlake-boys-high-school-killed-during-coastal-classic-yacht-race/4WZBJYNRJVGF7PUW5TJQW7SVJM/ Rachel Maher"School won't be the same without him," Westlake Boys' principal tells students. Mon, 23 Oct 2023 05:19:11 +0000 Simon Smith had taught at Westlake Boys' High School for 35 years and was just weeks away from retirement when he died during the Coastal Classic.
